author: retke (El Laggron)
description:
Autorole based on the invite the user used.
If the user joined using invite x, he will get a list of roles linked to invite x.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing roleinvite. Please check the wiki for all informations about the cog.
https://github.com/retke/Laggrons-Dumb-Cogs/wiki
Everything you need to know about setting up the cog is here.
